title: Understanding Your Unique Customer Identification Code (UCIC)
image_desc:
A stylized graphic depicting a secure digital lock with an alphanumeric code displayed on a screen. Type: vector

### Video Suggestion:
A stock footage video showing a secure online banking interface with data encryption visuals.
video_desc: A stock footage video showing a secure online banking interface with data encryption visuals.
narration: Welcome In this video we'll explore the importance of your Unique Customer Identification Code or UCIC and how it helps protect your financial information.

title: What is a UCIC?
content:
A unique alphanumeric code.
Assigned by financial institutions.
Used for identification and security.
image_desc:
A close-up image of a bank statement or online banking portal subtly highlighting the UCIC field. Type: photo

### Video Suggestion:
N/A
narration: A UCIC or Unique Customer Identification Code is a special alphanumeric code given to you by your bank or other financial institution.  It's like a personal identifier ensuring your information is kept safe and secure.

title: Why is my UCIC Important?
content:
Enhanced Security
Prevents Identity Theft
Simplifies Account Management
image_desc:
An illustration showing a shield protecting personal data with a UCIC prominently displayed. Type: illustration

### Video Suggestion:
N/A
narration: Your UCIC is crucial for enhanced security. It helps prevent identity theft and makes managing your accounts much easier and more efficient.

title: Where Can I Find My UCIC?
content:
**Column 1: Online Banking**
Check your profile settings.
Look for account summary details.
**Column 2: Physical Documents**
Check your bank statements.
Look for your welcome package.
image_desc:
A split screen showing a screenshot of an online banking profile page (left) and a physical bank statement (right), both subtly highlighting where the UCIC might be located. Type: collage

### Video Suggestion:
N/A
narration: You can usually find your UCIC in a few places.  Check your online banking profile your account summary or your physical bank statements and welcome packages.

title: Protecting Your UCIC
content: (Caption below image: Keep your UCIC confidential.  Do not share it with anyone.)
image_desc:
An image depicting a person securely protecting sensitive information, perhaps with a lock or a safe. Type: photo

### Video Suggestion:
N/A
narration: Remember your UCIC is confidential.  Never share it with anyone even if they claim to be from your bank.

title: Questions?
content: (Caption below image: Contact your financial institution for assistance.)
image_desc:
An image of a friendly customer service representative helping a customer. Type: photo

### Video Suggestion:
N/A
narration: If you have any questions about your UCIC please contact your financial institution for assistance.  Thank you for watching.
